data.title: NAGASAKA
data.text:
NAGASAKA Yasumasa

Chair, Standing Committee on Land, Infrastructure, Transport and Tourism, House of Representatives

In-House Group: Liberal Democratic Party

Elected: Aichi 9th District (single-seat constituency), four times

Born: 10 April 1957, Ichinomiya (former Bisai), Aichi

Education:

Tokai High School

College of Economics, Aoyama Gakuin University

Career:

Secretary to KAIFU Toshiki, Member of the House of Representatives

Secretary to Prime Minister KAIFU Toshiki (Researcher of the Cabinet Secretariat)

Member, Aichi Prefectural Assembly (elected six times)

Chairperson, General Assembly of the Liberal Democratic Party (LDP) Members, Aichi Prefectural Assembly

Secretary-General, Federation of Aichi Prefecture LDP Branches

Parliamentary Vice-Minister of Cabinet Office

Parliamentary Vice-Minister for Reconstruction

State Minister of Economy, Trade and Industry

State Minister of Cabinet Office
